summary: This is my first abode and i hope you like it, It took me long time more info down below.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first Player home (Abode) and it took me long time (whole day non stop) but i didn\'t know that i will finish it at the same day anyways the shack can be found east from the river wood it is located in map too so just look around the Riverwood\'s region and you will find it no key required so its beautiful and there is everything and its built in the mountain so that\'s why it has so much foliage but it makes the home look pretty from inside. 
              ---Update v1.3---
-Added some critters that every once in a while fly around(by request)
-Added a waterfall at the end of the house, by the table
-Still working on the aquarium(by request)
-Working on the Swamp for 1.4(by request)
              ---Update v1.2---
-Added Merchant to the house (blacksmith) hes wandering inside the house.
-Fixed some navigation issues in the house when stuck in the garden.
-Still working on npc entering and exiting house.              


              ---Update v1.1---
-Fixed some holes in the gardens at the sides.
-Fixed Name of the home in the map (Forest Shack) - (Forest Hub).
-Still Working on Navigation Mesh for NPC\'s Ex.(Lydia) to navigate and get into the house.
author: Typer
